summary: Excelent delphi like pascal development enviroment

description: Very good, it's easy to install.

Lazarus is a visual studio like IDE for the Free Pascal Compiler. This is very much like the Delphi RAD builder sold by Embarcadero Technologies except this doesn't cost $1000. It includes a full suite of visual components that can be dropped on a blank form. There is a learning curve, but once mastered this is a highly productive way to develop and debug applications.
summary: The best GUI desktop application development environment

description: This is an outstanding IDE allwoing crossplatform, Object Pascal and oterwise language-agnostic development for Linux, macOS and Windows with integrated, event-driven GUI form designer. It is very similar to Embarcadero Delphi (but completely free!). There is an active community around the project. Also to recommend, the Blaise Pascal journal and books available via subscription (based in the Netherlands, editor Detlef Overbeek).

I have been using Lazarus with free pascal for many years. It can develop programs for Windows, Linux and Mac and am impressed how it has advanced over the years. I fully recommend Lazarus as an IDE for Object Pascal programming.
The fastest desktop application development IDE easy to learn, easy to use.

Ich benutze Lazarus schon über 15 Jahre. Sehr gut gepflegte IDE. Alles was man programmiert läuft unter Linux, Windows und Raspi super.
Schön, dass es jetzt auch in Discover zu finden ist!
Прекрасное решение для быстрой разработки эффективных кроссплатформенных приложений.
Отличное IDE. Одно из лучших в отрасли
very simple and optimised but not usual window forms, need some time to adaptive or u can change it to 1 window(like VS)
就是 Linux 版本的 Delphi，让我想起了 Kylix！超级赞！！！
summary: 无与伦比的 RAD 开发工具
